Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
crackpot \crackpot\ n. a whimsically eccentric person.
Syn: crank, nut, nutcase, screwball. [WordNet 1.5]
crackpot n : a whimsically eccentric person [syn: {crank}, {nut}, {nut case}, {nutcase}, {fruitcake}, {screwball}]
